TopicTitle: Community RO/RSS Orphaned Mod and Parts Added. Looking for collab or some help!

Articles.Content:
Hey everyone so I am obsessed with RO and RP-1. The one thing I hate so much is that there isn't really a centralized place to get what you need short of trial and error. I have decided to put the time in to prune the Orphaned or RO parts missing from the RP-1 tech tree and adding them. So far I have been using Janitors Closet to prune any part not labelled RO (unless its parts like cargo bays or structural). I have about 100 mods installed and have a nice list of parts I will find a proper and accurate place for in the tech tree. So far I have added around 100 parts to the tech tree., What would be great though would be to get a community collab going to do the following:

1.) Price the parts out in a proper way. Finding pricing has been a hard thing for me so far and I am just kind of guessing.

2.) Find duplicate parts and figure out which part is the most accurate, stable, or has the best model. For example, I have 8 AJ-10's from the mix of mods I have. Would be nice to figure out which is the best so we can catalogue the best parts to use.

3.) Create MM patches or use the Configuration App to create a fork for the devs to add. There are a ton of mods and I can't do them all myself.

I will also export my Janitors Closet prune list so once we get going we can add a list of which are the best mods to install and then use the export list to prune all non-compatible parts out to help speed up the loading time and de-clutter. If anyone is interested in helping or contributing let me know!

The first major mod I am looking at is Bluedog_DB. Does anyone know what the difference is between Bluedog and the RO_XXXXXX files that are also Bluedog? Are they the same files?

I am also working on looking over JadeofMaar's OPT mod which he just added RO/RP support for.

Finally, working on all the Space X mods, looking at stats and models to determine which one is the best and most complete. If anyone has any suggestions with the best Space X mod for RO/RP let me know!
